markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Conrasu Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=2779) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conrasu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=343" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have learned about your history and your people from shapers. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) and [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Conrasu Lore](/Traits.aspx?ID=343).
name: Conrasu Lore
